Mr. Epstein's death is a tragedy to everyone involved in his case. CHAMBERS OF RICHARD M. BERMAN UNITED STATES DISTRICT JUDGE

August 12, 2019 Lamine N'Diaye, Warden Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Dear Warden N'Diaye, Thank you for your letter of August 10, 2019 regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein. Mr. Epstein's death is a tragedy to everyone involved in his case. One open question, among others, is whether the investigations referenced in your letter will include the incident at MCC involving Mr. Epstein on or about July 23, 2019. To my knowledge, it has never been definitively explained what the BOP concluded about that incident.
Sincerely, Richard M. Berman cc: Chief Judge Colleen McMahon District Executive Supervisory Staff Attorney MCC Michael Greco, U.S. Marshal Assistant United States Attorney Counsel for Mr. Epstein

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Richard M. Berman to Lamine N'Diaye regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein. The letter is typed with a handwritten signature. There are redactions in the cc list.
